{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3707200,"name":"","username":"ultimate_hecker","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/ultimate_hecker/{size}/187485_2.png","created_at":"2025-08-08T16:52:56.527Z","cooked":"

Hello. We have recently tried to switch to AdvantageKit to take advantage of replay. We have converted our swerve drive over, but seem to be having issue when we try to rotate our robot in the simulator, it just seems to strafe diagonally. Ive looked through my runVelocity(), but it might be something I overlooked in DriveCommands.java or somewhere else.

Screenshot from 2025-08-08 12-51-59632×645 152 KB

    10.

    21. 
          
  21.     PhoenixOdometryThread.getInstance().start();
    22.

All your module commands and feedback come to/from the flModule.
